CHAT.comment: Transcriber 1 Terri Schilthorn 19-JUL-89 Transcriber 2 Terri Schilthorn 25-MAR-90

u.a: M is attempting to get up off the floor
pause while M gets up and C sits at table
M gets up and goes over to snack area
pause while both watch M open and pour juice
C drinks his juice and M pours hers
M places cokie container on table
pause while M drinks and C eats
pause while M drinks and C eats
M points to house they built before snack began
pause while M watches C eat and drink
pause while M drinks and C eats
C holds out cookie to M
pause while M watches C drink
referring to moving cookie container out of the way as he spreads his napkin out .
C goes over to trash can
C puts napkin in trash can and walks over to toy area; M stil at table
M joins C in toy area
pause while C plays and M watches
